name: Blue-Eyes Alternative Ultimate Dragon
desc:
"Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls, or up to 3 instead if this card was Fusion Summoned using a monster whose original name is "Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon" as material; destroy them. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated.
str2: Summoned with "Blue-Eyes Alternative White Dragon" as material
